Package moe.caramel.daydream.event.player

Class PlayerAdvancementPreLoadEvent

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.event.Event
org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerEvent
moe.caramel.daydream.event.player.PlayerAdvancementPreLoadEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerAdvancementData, Cancellable
@NullMarked public final class PlayerAdvancementPreLoadEvent extends PlayerEvent implements PlayerAdvancementData, Cancellable
플레이어의 발전 과제 데이터를 로드하기 직전에 호출됩니다.

일반적으로 PlayerJoinEvent 이전에 호출됩니다.
